description: The Course teaches students how to use English for everyday situations and purposes related to social life and leisure. A range of higher-level comprehension skills is developed.

syllabus.zh:
This course is organized into 6 modules and each contains several lessons. Each module is based on a different theme, and each lesson covers a different aspect of the theme.
1.socializing
2.hotels/ accommodation
3.food and drink
4.international travel/ attractions and activities
5.money
6.communications

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 能了解及翻譯基本餐飲業的英文對話知識及運用。
能針對餐飲業上的專業知識以適當英文加以應用。
能解析餐飲業的營運方式，將其有效的使用專業的餐旅英文作口語表達。
能有效的應用MS office 軟體進而呈現專業性的報告及簡報。
